channel.title: Getting new items to work with spawn? HELP
channel.description: I have a source that does not recognize godswords i think. i am able to spawn one, but i can not wield it correctly, it is a "" non existant item" is there anyway to correct this? or no thanks

item.title: Getting new items to work with spawn? HELP
item.dc:creator: @MasterofPK MasterofPK
item.description:
@MasterofPK wrote:

In item.cfg, find “Dragon Scimitar”, once you have found it copy the entire line.

it will look like this

item = 4587	Dragon_scimitar	A_vicious,_curved_sword.	61608.0013642381	61608.0013642381	80929.5918252946	8	67	-2	0	0	0	1	0	0	0	66	0

Past it down the bottom, this should be obvious… but, change the item ID to the godsword one
then change the name and the message after it “A_vicious,_curved_sword” to “A_Godsword” or something and that should do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting new items to work with spawn? HELP
